title: Monogatari Series Heroine Hon
original_name: アニメ＜物語＞シリーズヒロイン本
sinopse:
Short stories included in the Monogatari Series Heroine Books.

1. Ehon: Maigo no Katatsumuri (Picture Book: Lost Snail)
2. Douwa: Utsukushi Hime (Beautiful Princess)
3. Hitagi Throwing
4. Rouka God
5. Karen Brushing
6. Tsukihi Brushing
7. Yotsugi Stress
